```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
```

```{r}
games_df = read_csv("./games.csv")
```

Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
developer_choices = arrange(games_df, console_developer) %>% pull(console_developer) %>% unique()
radioButtons(
  "developer_choice",
  h3("Console Developer"),
  choices = developer_choices
)

genre_choices = games_df %>% pull(genre) %>% unique()
selectInput(
  "genre_choice",
  h3("Genre Choice"),
  choices = genre_choices,
  selected = "Action"
)

sliderInput(
  "year_range",
  h3("Year Range"),
  2001, 2020, 
  value = c(2005, 2015),
  sep = "")
```
